name: Heroes Of The 357th
summary:
Heroes Of The 357th is a World War II Air Combat Simulation. Fly with World War II's finest pilots: The 357th Fighter Group.

Based on the actual missions of one of the top fighter groups of World War II, Heroes of the 357th combines historical accuracy with challenging gameplay. Enlist in the 357th Fighter Group and fly with real American aces such as Leonard "Kit" Carson and Bud Anderson in a classic fight for the sky against the deadly German Luftwaffe.

Become a member of the 357th.
